Kate Middleton misses traditional St. Pa.content: While Kate continued her recovery out of the public eye, the Irish Guards held their parade as scheduled.Patrick's Day parade reportedly due to her ongoing recovery from abdominal surgery.The Irish Guards will be in the spotlight again in June when they Troop the Colour at King Charles' annual birthday parade.The public's concern and curiosity surrounding Kate have grown into a global topic of conversation due to her prolonged absence from public life following abdominal surgery in January.While Kensington Palace initially stated that her recovery would keep her out of the public eye until after March, several unusual details and the lack of specific medical information have fuelled speculation and conspiracy theories on social media.

Shakira says she prioritised relationshi.content: Shakira recently opened up about her 11-year relationship with ex-partner Gerard Piqué, revealing that she put her career on hold to support him during his time with FC Barcelona."For a long time, I put my career on hold, to be next to Gerard, so he could play football," Shakira said." The couple had confirmed their relationship in 2011 after meeting while she was promoting her 2010 World Cup anthem, “Waka Waka (This Time for Africa).”In an interview with The Sunday Times, Shakira reflected on how she prioritised her relationship with Piqué over her career.She spoke about giving up professional opportunities to be by his side while he played football for FC Barcelona.

Javed Akhtar says his first marriage fai.content: Veteran lyricist Javed Akhtar has talked about his struggle with alcoholism and how it was the major reason behind his failed first marriage with Honey Irani.During the same interview, he shared that Shabana ‘somehow managed’ his alcoholism for the first ’10 years of their marriage’.But when I used to drink all those barriers will break and I would become a very nasty man and would use foul language.It impacted my marriage with Honey.During his recent interview with Mojo Story, Akhtar recalled drinking heavily which eventually led to the end of his 11-year-long marriage.

YouTuber Elvish Yadav arrested for alleg.content: Bigg Boss OTT season 2 winner and YouTuber Elvish Yadav was attested on Sunday (March 17) by Noida Police in the snake venom case.His name emerged after Uttar Pradesh's Noida Police raided a rave party on suspicion of snake venom being used after getting a tip-off from NGO People for Animals (PFA) last year.Yadav was accused of supplying snake venom at the rave party in Noida's Sector 51 on November 3 last year.Yadav was detained by Noida police after forensic reports revealed that the sample seized from the rave party contained snake venom.In November 2023, an FIR was lodged against Elvish and five others for allegedly supplying snake venom to different parties.

Usher makes special mention of women in.content: NAACP's Johnson said in a statement, “We are honoured to present this year’s President’s Award to Usher for his unparalleled talent and remarkable contributions as an artist and advocate for our community.“Usher stands as a distinguished multihyphenate performer, consistently setting new standards for Black Excellence,” BET president and CEO Scott Mills said in his own statement.BET president and CEO Scott Mills also commended Usher, describing him as a distinguished performer who has set new standards for Black excellence.Usher, 45, was presented with the President's Award by NAACP President and CEO Derrick Johnson."In a statement, Johnson praised Usher for his talent and contributions as an artist and advocate for the community.

NAACP Image Awards: Queen Latifah, Taraj.content: Henson to highlight the ongoing issue of pay inequality for Black actresses in Hollywood.Henson, who won Outstanding Supporting Actress in a Motion Picture for The Color Purple, used her acceptance speech to address pay inequality in Hollywood.”The cameras then cut to Henson, who was sitting with the audience, and said, “Equal pay for Black actresses.”Henson has been a vocal advocate for pay equality in Hollywood.“I’m just tired of working so hard, being gracious at what I do [and] getting paid a fraction of the cost,” Henson said.

Madame Tussauds Orlando unveils new Dua.content: As anticipation builds for Dua Lipa's upcoming third studio album, Radical Optimism, a new wax figure of the pop sensation has been unveiled at Madame Tussauds Orlando on International Drive.He described the wax figure as a love letter to the superstar and her album Future Nostalgia, which helped uplift spirits during a challenging time.“When the world stopped in 2020, Dua Lipa was the first artist to ensure we all kept dancing in our living rooms with her smash record, Future Nostalgia,” general manager of Madame Tussauds Orlando Paul Gould said in a release.General manager of Madame Tussauds Orlando, Paul Gould, praised Dua Lipa for her impact on pop music, especially during the early stages of the COVID-19 pandemic.Clad in a fuchsia Balenciaga lace catsuit with matching gloves, boots, a bedazzled choker, and sparkly purple eyeshadow, the wax figure captures one of Dua Lipa's most memorable looks from her Future Nostalgia tour.

Friends star David Schwimmer makes rare.content: He thanked Perry for ten incredible years of laughter and creativity, praising his impeccable comic timing and ability to make even the simplest line of dialogue incredibly original and funny."Thank you for ten incredible years of laughter and creativity," he wrote alongside a photo of him posing with Perry on set."Following the death of his Friends co-star Matthew Perry in October 2023, Schwimmer shared a heartfelt tribute for his friend on Instagram.He has shared moments from his professional life, including a recent Uber Eats commercial with Friends co-star Jennifer Aniston, but tends to keep his personal life out of the spotlight."You could take a straight line of dialogue and bend it to your will, resulting in something so entirely original and unexpectedly funny it still astonishes."

Pierce Brosnan apologises after fined fo.content: Actor Pierce Brosnan has said he deeply regrets walking off trail in Yellowstone National Park in the United States after he was fined by a court in Wyoming for getting too close to a thermal area.Citing court documents, it said the James Bond actor had in November uploaded photos to Instagram of himself "standing on a Yellowstone National Park thermal feature at Mammoth Hot Springs", referring to the scenic area in the park's northern part."However, I made an impulsive mistake - one that I do not take lightly - when entering a thermal area covered in snow in Yellowstone National Park to take a photograph.Brosnan, 70, pleaded guilty to foot travel in a thermal area and was fined $500 and required to pay a $1,000 community service payment to the Yellowstone Forever Geological Fund, the U."There are signs posted in the area that warn visitors of the dangers of thermal features and state that visitors must remain on the designated boardwalks and trails," it said.

What a night! Ed Sheeran sings in Punjab.content:
''First Diljit made Sia sing in Punjabi and now Ed Sheeran 😮

No words left to explain the levels this man has taken PUNJABI MUSIC to 🔥 #DiljitDosanjh #EdSheeran pic.To make his performance in India extra special, Ed collaborated with Punjabi singer Diljeet Dosanjh.Shahid Kapoor's wife Mira shared a clip of her daughter dancing as Ed performed live on the stage.One user wrote, ''No words left to explain the levels this man has taken PUNJABI MUSIC to.''Watching Ed perform on a Punjabi song, netizens couldn't contain their excitement.

Late singer Sidhu Moosewala’s parents we.content: Taking to his Instagram handle, he shared a photo of him holding his newborn child as he sat beside the photo of the late singer.Renowned Punjabi singer Moosewala was the only child of his parents.The Canada-based singer made his debut into the world of music in 2017 with his debut song ''G Wagon.Late Punjabi singer Sidhu Moosewala's parents Charan Kaur and Balkaur Singh have been blessed with a baby boy.The couple have welcomed their second child almost two years after they lost their son.

Road House remake honours Patrick Swayze.content: I'm going to regroup after this work and get back to work for my fighting career.In the 2024 version, Gyllenhaal plays former Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC) fighter Dalton, who runs into trouble as he takes on a job as a bouncer at a bar in the Florida Keys.Celebrating the legacy of late actor Patrick Swayze was essential in remaking his 1989 hit movie Road House, says the new film's star Jake Gyllenhaal.”The new Doug Liman-directed movie marks the acting debut of former UFC champion Conor McGregor.The 43-year-old actor spent some two months getting in shape for the stunts and action scenes in the movie shot in the Dominican Republic.

Crew trailer: Tabu, Kareena, Kriti are r.content: After a short teaser and posters, the makers have finally dropped the first trailer of the Crew starring three acting powerhouses Tabu, Kareena Kapoor Khan, and Kriti Sanon.On Saturday (March 16), the makers dropped the first trailer of the movie which took us into the troubled life of three flight attendants, who are bored with their low-income job, and the only thing they are now craving is a lavish life that they all have dreamt of living.Helmed by Rajesh Krishnan, the three-minute trailer gave us a sneak peek of the turbulent field flight that the passengers will board on March 29.While Kareena Kapoor Khan's impeccable comic timing will leave you in splits, Tabu effortlessly shines in her role as an air hostess.This is the first time Kareena, Tabu, and Kriti are sharing screen space.

Javed Akhtar claps back at Sandeep Reddy.content: I think in a democratic society, he has the right to make one Animal, and many Animals.In 53 years of my career, he could not find one film, one script, one scene, one dialogue, one song.Veteran screenwriter and lyricist Javed Akhtar has addressed the recent controversy surrounding his comments on filmmaker Sandeep Reddy Vanga's latest movie, Animal, starring Ranbir Kapoor.On the work front, Javed is currently working on the lyrics for the film Lahore 1947, while Sandeep is gearing up to start shooting for Spirit and Animal Park.Speaking to Mojo Story, Javed emphasised Sandeep's right to make any film he chooses but expressed his worry about the impact such films might have on viewers.

‘I love dressing her up’: Priyanka Chopr.content: She continues to update her fans with the fun activities of Malti, and during her recent interview, the global star talked about how much she loves dressing up her daughter.The Citadel actress has arrived in the country for a luxury brand event and during her recent interview with Vogue India, the actress  affectionately talked about her daughter, whom she called her current ‘fashion muse’.The Padmavat actress landed in her homeland earlier this week with her daughter, Malti.Chopra and her endearing moments with her daughter Malti have always been one of the most discussed topics on the internet.When asked Priyanka about her current source of inspiration as a fashion designer, Priyanka said, “My fashion muse at the moment is my daughter, I love dressing her up.

Sydney Sweeney stuns in sculpted top and.content: She even cast them in the film as little old nuns, adding a personal touch to the project.” She also revealed during her appearance on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon that she cast the two in the film, adding, “They were, like, little old nuns in there.The 26-year-old actress donned an avant-garde top paired with high-waisted black wide-leg trousers, showcasing a unique and artistic look."Regarding her film Immaculate, Sweeney shared that she flew her grandmothers to Italy for the shoot, fulfilling their dreams of visiting Europe.Sydney Sweeney made a striking gothic statement at the Los Angeles premiere of her new film, Immaculate.

Bollywood singer Anuradha Paudwal joins.content: The announcement of her joining the party came during a press conference where senior BJP leaders were present to welcome the singer into the party fold.It is my good fortune that I am joining BJP today," the singer reportedly said after she joined the saffron party.Renowned Bollywood singer Anuradha Paudwal, who has also lent her voice to many devotional albums besides film songs and has garnered widespread acclaim for her melodious singing, joined the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) on Saturday (Mar 16).She has also collaborated with many leading composers and singers in the Indian music industry and has won several prestigious awards for her contributions to music, including the Padma Shri, one of the highest civilian honours in India.The party released its first list of 195 candidates on March 2.

Celine Dion pens a note on stiff person.content: Legendary singer Celine Dion is suffering from a rare neurological disorder, the stiff person syndrome.After her stiff person syndrome diagnosis, Celine has taken a break from her career.On International Stiff Person Syndrome (SPS) Awareness Day, Celine penned an encouraging note on her Instagram as she expressed her gratitude to her fans and family for their constant support.However, the singer is currently working on a documentary on herself and her struggle with neurological disorders.The upcoming documentary titled I Am: Celine Dion will show the singer's struggle with the syndrome.
